cause.description:
The Amur Leopard is the rarest species of leopard. It is mainly found in Russia. Over the past year their numbers in the wild have decreased. there are only about 25 to 34 known Amur Leopards left in the wild and about 6 are female. Their habitats are being destroyed, and they are being hunted down. This rare and beautiful creature has to be saved. It is said that in about 4 years there will be no more amur leopards left in the wild.
1. This beautiful creature must be saved.
2. The hunt for these animals must stop.
3. The habitat of these animals should be preserved.
cause.name: Save the Amur Leopard
